comment: Interestingly when I look at my relationship to different mathematicians, it is often the case              that our common ancestor is Simeon Poisson who had only three advisees: Chasles,
Now a days teaching is very easy beacause i can teach any topic with proper visulization to students .which is very helpful for students.
Practice makes a men Perfect,If the practice do in creative way which is more efficient and understandable.In mordern era through internet anthing can understandable for students to learning.
Interestingly when I look at my relationship to different mathematicians, it is often the case              that our common ancestor is Simeon Poisson who had only three advisees: Chasles,

The students of the future will demand the learning support that is appropriate for their               situation or context. Nothing more, nothing less. And they want it at the moment the need arises. Not sooner,             not later. Mobile devices will be a key technology for providing that learning support.
Technology is not a silver bullet. It’s only as good as the teachers … using it as one more tool           to help inspire, and teach, and work through problems
